title: Etoiles 2: Ici Paris
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Languages, Modern - Study and teaching
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
description: This second instalment of the 'Etoiles' series uses a pacy magazine style to take the viewer around Paris and its most original and quirky aspects. Far from concentrating on the usual monuments and landmarks, this series attach itself to the lifestyles of 12-14 year old people living in Paris, the variety of their experiences and ethnic background. The programme is intended to be used by second year French students and above. It contains 5 episodes on 13 minutes each (approx.) Includes guide with transcripts of each episode and additional activities.
